headline: Did Keysight's (KEYS) $1.7B Software Acquisitions Just Shift Its Next-Gen Wireless Investment Narrative?
summary: On October 20, 2025, Keysight Technologies completed acquisitions of Spirent, Optical Solutions Group, and PowerArtist for approximately US$1.7 billion, aimed at expanding its software offerings across communications, aerospace, and automotive sectors. These transactions are expected to enhance Keysight's software-centric capabilities and support its 6G and system-level simulation strategies, positioning the company for growth in evolving technology markets. headline: Keysight (KEYS): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q2 Earnings?
summary: Keysight has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 23.8% to $167.33 per share while the index has gained 27.3%.
